description: Enables DWARF debugging of webassembly in js-debug
name: @codeeditorland/dwarf-debugging

scripts.build: npm run build-native-ext-image && npm run copy-out-native-ext && npm run build-meta
scripts.build-meta: rimraf dist && node esbuild.js && tsc src/index.ts --target es2021 --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
